CN.content:

Paragraph: The electrochemical properties of PffBB-n were determined by cyclic voltammetry.

Let's think step by step.

1. Identify potential compounds or materials mentioned in the paragraph.
2. Determine the role of each compound or material in the context of the paragraph.
3. Label the identified compounds or materials as "Material Name" entities.

Step 1: Identify potential compounds or materials mentioned in the paragraph:

Step 2: Determine the role of each compound or material in the context of the paragraph:
- PffBB-n is the material whose electrochemical properties are being determined by cyclic voltammetry.

Step 3: Label the identified compounds or materials as "Material Name" entities:

Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Material Name: PffBB-n.

This label indicates that "PffBB-n" is the material of interest in the paragraph. All other entities in the paragraph are not relevant to the Material Name label.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The electrochemical properties of PffBB-n were determined by cyclic voltammetry.

Let's think step by step.

1. PffBB-n: This is the compound or material whose electrochemical properties are being referred to in the paragraph. It can be considered as the "Property Entity" or "Subject" with the property being "electrochemical properties".
2. electrochemical properties: This is the type of property being described or measured in the paragraph. It is the "Property Name" or "Predicate" in this context.
3. cyclic voltammetry: This is the method used to determine the electrochemical properties of PffBB-n. It can be considered as the "Measurement Technique" or "Instrument" used to observe or measure the "Property Name" (electrochemical properties) of the "Property Entity" (PffBB-n).
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. PffBB-n: This is the material whose electrochemical property is being referred to in the paragraph.
2. electrochemical property: This is the property of the material (PffBB-n) that is being described or measured in the paragraph.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| electrochemical property of PffBB-n |
